item.title: Yesterday, the US Ethereum Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $4.528 billion, with BlackRock's ETHA experiencing a net inflow of $4.4 billion.
item.description: On July 26th, based on the monitoring of Farside Investors, the net inflow into the US Ethereum spot ETF yesterday was $452.8 million. This includes:- BlackRock ETHA: +$440.1 million- Fidelity FETH: +$7.3 million- Bitwise ETHW: +$10 million- Grayscale ETHE: -$23.5 million- Grayscale Ethereum Trust: +$18.9 million

item.title: Yesterday, the US Bitcoin Spot ETF saw a net inflow of $130 million
item.description: July 26th. Based on Farside Investors' data, the net inflow into US Bitcoin spot ETF yesterday was $130.8 million. This includes:BlackRock IBIT: + $92.8 millionFidelity FBTC: + $10.2 millionBitwise BITB: + $21.0 millionARK ARKB: + $30.3 millionVanEck HODL: + $18.2 millionGrayscale GBTC: - $50.5 millionGrayscale BTC Mini: + $8.8 million

item.title: US-listed company Bit Digital plans to increase its authorized share capital to buy more ETH
item.description: July 26th. According to SEC filings, the publicly traded company Bit Digital (BTBT) in the U.S. disclosed that a significant shareholder meeting is scheduled to be held on September 10, 2025, at 9:00 AM at the company's main office address (11th floor, 31 Hudson Yards, New York, New York, USA), with the option of online streaming available. Shareholders can attend the meeting in person or participate through online streaming to exercise their voting rights and submit questions during the meeting. The meeting will deliberate on approving an increase in the company's authorized capital from $3.5 million (comprising 340 million common shares with a par value of $0.01 per share; and 10 million preferred shares with a par value of $0.01 per share) to $10.1 million (consisting of 1 billion common shares with a par value of $0.01 per share; and 10 million preferred shares with a par value of $0.01 per share).Bit Digital stated that the company intends to raise a significant amount of additi

item.title: Two addresses suspected to belong to the same whale have sold a total of 3810.76 ETH in the last 10 hours.
item.description: On July 26th, according to on-chain analyst Ai Auntie (@ai_9684xtpa), two addresses that are suspected to belong to the same entity have sold 3810.76 ETH within the past 10 hours. The total value of these sales is $13.92 million. If these ETH were sold, the entity would make a profit of $2.693 million.It is reported that both addresses accumulated ETH between October 2024 and June 2025. The average cost of one address is $2940, and the average cost of the other address is $2977. They started selling in batches yesterday. So far, a total of 5540.76 ETH has been transferred to exchanges, with an approximate value of $20.09 million.

item.title: US Stock Market closed on Friday with most Crypto Stocks falling, SBET down by 5.70%
item.description: On July 26th, according to the market data of rockflow, the US stock market closed on Friday. The Dow rose by 208 points, the S&P 500 rose by 0.4%, and the Nasdaq rose by 0.24%. Cryptocurrency stocks generally declined, including:Coinbase (COIN) decreased by 1.27%, with a trading volume of $3.388 billion.MicroStrategy (MSTR) decreased by 2.18%, with a trading volume of $3.404 billion.BTCS (BTCS) decreased by 5.58%, with a trading volume of $30.985 million.Bit Digital (BTBT) decreased by 2.48%, with a trading volume of $64.216 million.SharpLink Gaming (SBET) decreased by 5.70%, with a trading volume of $1.078 billion.Bitmine Immersion (BMNR) decreased by 4.67%, with a trading volume of $1.181 billion.

item.title: Solana Ecosystem Meme Coin MEMECOIN briefly surged above $0.05 today, marking a 5325% gain in the last 7 days.
item.description: On July 26th, according to GMGN market data, Solana's ecosystem Meme coin just memecoin (MEMECOIN) broke through $0.05 in the early hours of today. It is currently trading at $0.04917, with a 23.8% increase in the past 24 hours and a 5325% increase in the past 7 days. The market capitalization is currently $49.15 million, and the 24-hour trading volume is $17.07 million.BlockBeats Note: Meme coins often experience significant price volatility, which is usually driven by market sentiment and hype and lacks real value or use cases. Investors should be cautious of the risks involved.

item.title: The SharpLink address has transferred 145 million USDC to Galaxy, either for ETH accumulation or other purposes.
item.description: On July 26th, as monitored by on-chain data analyst Yu Jin, the SharpLink address transferred the 145 million USDC received earlier today from the Circle address to the Galaxy Digital wallet. Previously, SharpLink Gaming mainly purchased ETH through Galaxy Digital, and this 145 million USDC may still be used to increase its ETH holdings.

item.title: 8 new addresses have amassed a total of 583,000 ETH since July 9.
item.description: On July 26th, based on the monitoring of LookOnChain, 8 new addresses have witnessed an increase in their holdings by 42,788 ETH ($159 million) on this day. From July 9th onwards, these 8 new addresses have accumulated a total of 583,248 ETH (approximately $2.17 billion).

item.title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index Slightly Rises to 72
item.description: On July 26th, according to Alternative Data, the Fear and Greed Index of cryptocurrencies today is 72 (yesterday it was 70), and the "greed" sentiment in the market has rebounded slightly.Note: The Fear and Greed Index has a threshold ranging from 0 to 100 and incorporates the following indicators: Volatility (25%) + Market Volume (25%) + Social Media Hype (15%) + Market Surveys (15%) + Bitcoin Dominance (10%) + Google Trends Analysis (10%).

item.title: The new address received an additional 13,696.8 ETH from Galaxy, pushing its total holdings to over 100,000 ETH.
item.description: On July 26th, as per the monitoring of Onchain Lens, a fresh address once more received 13,696.8 ETH from Galaxy. This amount is valued at $49.97 million. Presently, the wallet holds 100,972 ETH, with a worth of $375.74 million.
